description: Create a project import file verification
permissions: User must be authorized to create a project import file verification via ProjectImportFileVerificationPolicy, which delegates authorization to the related project policy.
side_effects: Creates a project import file verification and, unless it is a dry run, queues asynchronous processing that updates the related projects file import status and may update the file import's processed_at, raw_data, and note fields.
validation_notes: verification-type, file-import, and project are required. verification-type must be one of the supported verification types (currently Bid2Win). If the associated file import is not a supported file type for the verification handler, processing fails.

flags.name: --verification-type
flags.validation: Required; must be one of the supported verification types.

flags.name: --is-dry-run
flags.description: Create a dry run verification (does not process the file).
